root.message: The CLASS_SYSTEM field for indicator 2-2-3, translated into fr
root.data: OMS. (en anglais seulement) Haemoglobin concentrations for the diagnosis of anaemia and assessment of severity. Vitamin and Mineral Nutrition Information System. Genève, Organisation mondiale de la Santé, 2011 (WHO/NMH/NHD/MNM/11.1)(http://www.who.int/vmnis/indicators/haemoglobin.pdf, consulté le 4 mars 2021).
